## Model tables

```{r results = "asis"}

tables <- lapply(model_list, function(x) x$table)
sapply(seq_len(length(tables)), function(x){
  
  cat("## ", names(tables)[x])
  tables[[x]] |> 
    gt() |> 
    apa_style() |> 
    as_raw_html() |> 
    cat()
  
  cat("\\n")
  cat("\\n")
})

```
